Product Description

Neat Little Holder!

This car seat gap organizer box can help you become a neat holder!

Look No Further For Your KeysÔºÅ

If you have problems losing things in your car seat gaps, the car seat organizer front seat storage box is for you. It not only prevents small items from falling between the seats but also gives you a place to put change, a pen, toll cards, and other necessary ‚Äòcar items‚Äô and keeps them within reach. It is well-constructed and easy to install. Safe and reliable.

High Quality

Made of premium top-class PU and ABS material which is durable and is impact resistant. Interior velvet material increases friction to keep items from sliding and rattling.

Look No Further For Your Keys

Adds CONVENIENCE & SPACE for your keys, cards, money, charger, phone, and cosmeticsÔºåreceipts. Interior velvet material increases friction to keep items from sliding and rattling.

Intimate Settings

These car gap filler organizers can make it easier for you to find the ‚Äòcar items‚Äô you need on the road. The precise fit of the design transforms the organizer into several high boxes with storage compartments. Make your Armrest console organized and looks much cleaner.

Easy To Install

These car seat gap fillers with cup holders can be easily washed with water. Besides, the installation is relatively simple, no tools required, installation car seat gap filler just inserts the between car seat gap filler and console, Can find a suitable position.

Specification:

Product Color: Black Main Material: Flocking materials, PU Leather, and ABS Plastic Suitable: Not was suitable for car seat gaps wider than 0.6 inches(1.5 cm) and central console lower than the seat. Package size (L*W*H): 11.22in x 6.92in x 4.17in Product Weight: 1.91lb Package Content: 1 x Left Storage box 1 x Right Storage box 1 x Microfiber Cleaning Cloth 2 x Car Back Seat Headrest Hooks

New Version Car Seat Gap Filler – This car seat organizer has a good texture that feels like a baby’s skin that is fine and smooth. The car storage organizer front seat is made of high-quality black ABS plastic and PU leather that cannot break, slip, bend or leave any scratches. With a velvet material pads that can prevent items from sliding and rattling.
Fashion Design and Driving Safety – This front seat gap filler will help you create a neat and clean environment.¬†This seat gap filler fits the car seat gaps. Because it will not shake when you brake suddenly, and it is not too big to waste your car seat space. The new design added red stitching which adds to the overall appearance. Make your car more outstanding among friends.
Perfect Size Car Storage Organizer- Not suitable for car seat gaps¬†wider than 0.78 inches(2 cm) and central console lower than the seat. The size of the car seat gap organizer is 10.23 x 6.49 x 2.95 inches which is suitable for most vehicles. The cup holder can fit cups up to 2.75 inches in diameter. Just like the size of aluminum Coca-Cola. Please measure the distance between your seat and the console carefully before you purchase.
Excellent Service – 2 car seat back hooks and 1 microfiber cleaning cloth as the gift. We provide one year of free replacement of this car seat gap filler with cup holder and 6 months of quality assurance. Please rest assured to buy. If you are not 100% satisfied with your order, please email us directly, we promise to provide every customer with quality products and services.

Meet your new favorite coffee accessory: the Mr. Coffee Mug Warmer. Place your favorite cup of joe, tea, or cocoa on the plate, and it’ll keep it nice and hot for hours‚Äîso you can enjoy it at your leisure. It features a convenient on/off switch with an indicator light, and an extended power cord so you can use it just about anywhere.
17 watt mug warmer for use with coffee, tea, hot cocoa & more
Easy to tote and take anywhere
Surface easily wipes clean
On/off switch with indicator light
Longer power cord for increased mobility. Refer to the PDF attached below in Technical Specification for the User Manual

Read more

Experience the taste

Since 1970 the Mr. Coffee brand has been doing one thing and one thing only. .. brewing coffee. No one has served cup after delicious cup to more Americans than us.

For us, bringing a rich coffee experience into your home is our top priority. Along with coffee makers, we are here to share everything coffee with you.

Mr. Coffee Mug Warmer

Keep your favorite mug of coffee, tea or cocoa hot when you want it. The convenient on/off switch with on light indicator lets you know when it’s hot. With its extended cord length to use almost anywhere, this will be your favorite gadget!

  • Stop the worry of hot beverages going cold.
  • Easy to tote, take and use just about anywhere.
  • Surface easily wipes clean.

Read more

Keeps all your favorite hot beverages warm

On/off switch with convenient ‘on’ light indicator.

Use for coffee, tea, hot cocoa and more.

Fits many different mug styles and sizes.

Read more

Product Description

Popdart Color
3 Blue/Green Swirl | 3 Purple/Yellow 3 Blue | 3 Green 3 Purple | 3 Yellow 3 Blue (Glow) | 3 Green (Glow)

Target Marker
Wigglenobber Target Marker Original Target Marker Original Target Marker Original Glow Target Marker

Popdarts Decal

‚úì

Ruler printed on the carrying bag

‚úì

DETERMINE WHO GOES FIRST

Rock, Paper Scissors to determine who goes first.The winner chooses the first Target Marker location and the color of their team’s Popdarts.There are three Popdarts per player and they are made of a different color to distinguish between players.The game is played with two or more players.

CALL YOUR SHOT

To start a game, player one chooses a location with a smooth surface and places the Target Marker.Player one also calls the round parameters.Example: Player one places Target Marker on the countertop and says, ‚ÄúThrow standing from behind the couch.‚Äù

TAKE TURNS THROWING

Once the parameters are set, the player that placed the Target Marker throws the first Popdart.The players rotate throwing their Popdarts with the objective of landing on the Wigglenobber Target Marker or at least getting the closest to the Wigglnobber Target Marker.This continues until both players have thrown all their Popdarts.

HOW TO SCORE A ROUND

After both players have thrown all their Popdarts, the points will be awarded using ‚ÄúCancellation Scoring‚Äù.‚ÄúCancellation Scoring‚Äù = The points of one player cancel out the points of the opponent. (Example: If the blue team scores 5 points and the green team scores 2 points then the blue team wins the round with 3 points.)Any Popdart that does not suction to the surface is considered a dead dart and will remain in play until the end of the round.Land on the Wigglenobber Target Marker = 10 pointsClosest Popdart that sticks = 3 PointsEach other Popdart that sticks = 1 PointWigglenobber- When one Popdarts lands on top of another Popdarts. This is worth double the points of the Popdart that it lands on no matter what color.The player that was awarded points in the previous round begins the next round by selecting the next Target Marker location. Each game consists of multiple rounds. Games are played to 21 points. First to 21 wins.

About Us

Meet the Carman brothers and their families. Josh and Jason Carman grew up in Pennsylvania, graduated college and went on to establish their careers in finance and business. They are Christ-followers who enjoy the outdoors, sports, travel, food and spending time with family and friends. From a young age they have been active in sports and seemed to turn everything into a fun and competitive game. Flash forward a few years to 2020 and nothing has really changed! When many of us adjusted to the life of quarantine, Josh did what he has always done and created fun games out of nothing which is how Popdarts originated. After coming up with an initial prototype & establishing the game play, Josh & Jason set off on this journey with help from friends and family to make Popdarts what it is today.

OUR MISSION

In a world that isolates us with devices, we bring you a game that brings friends and family of all ages together, fuels creativity and challenges abilities!

WHY CHOOSE POPDARTS? In a world that isolates us with devices, we bring you a game that brings friends and family of all ages together, fuels creativity and challenges abilities!
WHAT‚ÄôS INCLUDED IN A SET? 3 Blue/Green Swirled Popdarts | 3 Purple/Yellow Popdarts | 1 Orange Wigglenobber Target Marker | 1 Mesh Carrying Bag with rules printed right on the bag
WHERE CAN I PLAY? Our compact sets can be played wherever you go, indoors or outdoors. Popdarts stick best to smooth surfaces like a countertop, refrigerator, window, car windshield, glass door, surfboard ‚Äì be creative!
HOW DO YOU SCORE? The closest Popdart to the Target Marker = 3 points. Every other Popdart that sticks = 1 point. Landing on the Wigglenobber Target Marker = 10 points.Use ‚ÄúCancellation Scoring‚Äù (just like cornhole). For example: 5 blue ‚Äì 2 green = 3 blue. Each game consists of multiple rounds! First team to reach 21 points wins!






Popdarts Pro Pack
Popdarts Original Pack
Popdarts Expansion Pack
Popdarts Glow Pack

‚úì

DETERMINE WHO GOES FIRST

  • Rock, Paper Scissors to determine who goes first.
  • The winner chooses the first Target Marker location and the color of their team’s Popdarts.
  • There are three Popdarts per player and they are made of a different color to distinguish between players.
  • The game is played with two or more players.

CALL YOUR SHOT

  • To start a game, player one chooses a location with a smooth surface and places the Target Marker.
  • Player one also calls the round parameters.
  • Example: Player one places Target Marker on the countertop and says, ‚ÄúThrow standing from behind the couch.‚Äù

TAKE TURNS THROWING

  • Once the parameters are set, the player that placed the Target Marker throws the first Popdart.
  • The players rotate throwing their Popdarts with the objective of landing on the Wigglenobber Target Marker or at least getting the closest to the Wigglnobber Target Marker.
  • This continues until both players have thrown all their Popdarts.

HOW TO SCORE A ROUND

  • After both players have thrown all their Popdarts, the points will be awarded using ‚ÄúCancellation Scoring‚Äù.
  • ‚ÄúCancellation Scoring‚Äù = The points of one player cancel out the points of the opponent. (Example: If the blue team scores 5 points and the green team scores 2 points then the blue team wins the round with 3 points.)
  • Any Popdart that does not suction to the surface is considered a dead dart and will remain in play until the end of the round.
  • Land on the Wigglenobber Target Marker = 10 points
  • Closest Popdart that sticks = 3 Points
  • Each other Popdart that sticks = 1 Point
  • Wigglenobber- When one Popdarts lands on top of another Popdarts. This is worth double the points of the Popdart that it lands on no matter what color.
  • The player that was awarded points in the previous round begins the next round by selecting the next Target Marker location. Each game consists of multiple rounds. Games are played to 21 points. First to 21 wins.

Read more

About Us

Meet the Carman brothers and their families. Josh and Jason Carman grew up in Pennsylvania, graduated college and went on to establish their careers in finance and business. They are Christ-followers who enjoy the outdoors, sports, travel, food and spending time with family and friends. From a young age they have been active in sports and seemed to turn everything into a fun and competitive game. Flash forward a few years to 2020 and nothing has really changed! When many of us adjusted to the life of quarantine, Josh did what he has always done and created fun games out of nothing which is how Popdarts originated. After coming up with an initial prototype & establishing the game play, Josh & Jason set off on this journey with help from friends and family to make Popdarts what it is today.

OUR MISSION

In a world that isolates us with devices, we bring you a game that brings friends and family of all ages together, fuels creativity and challenges abilities!

From the brand

Lusso Gear Family Favorites

Auto Organization Caddy: A multifunctional car and trunk organizer will help you declutter your floor and passenger seats. This foldable backseat automobile holder gives extra storage to any car in a matter of seconds.
9 Storage Pockets: These Car Organizers offer 2 spacious main bag areas, 1 secure rear zipper pocket, 4 built-in cup holders, and 2 additional front-facing mesh pockets to keep any car interior, console or carseat organized.
Secure Safety Handles: The Lusso Gear Car Organizer comes equipped with a set of 2 handles, comfy enough for small and large hands. Your car’s side and middle seat belts can be clipped through for extra road safety.
Driver’s Best Friend: The uses are endless. Use as a toy or snack tray, a mobile office, or for storing police gear. This collapsible car seat storage organizer can do almost anything.
Built to Last a Lifetime: Every Lusso Gear accessory proudly comes with a lifetime warranty. If you encounter any issue with your Lusso Gear Organizer, simply let us know. We’ll work with you to make it right.

Easy-Carry Handles

Two ergonomic carry handles make it simple to bring the Lusso Gear Car organizer (and everything inside it) just about anywhere.

Collapsible Design

Organizer folds flat in an instant thanks to a space-saving design, allowing for easier transport and convenient storage when not in use.

Secure Safety Straps

Convenient straps allow you to safely and securely clip your organizer into your vehicle seat belt so it stays in place, even during sudden unexpected stops.
